All functions

jqui_add_class jqui_remove_class jqui_switch_class

Class animation.

jqui_effect jqui_show jqui_hide jqui_toggle

Animation effects.

get_jqui_effects

Get available animation effects.

includeJqueryUI

Inject necessary js and css assets to the head of a shiny document (deprecated).

jqui_resizabled jqui_sortabled jqui_draggabled jqui_droppabled jqui_selectabled jqui_sortable jqui_draggable jqui_droppable jqui_selectable jqui_resizable

Mouse interactions

jqui_icon

Create a jQuery UI icon

orderInput

A shiny input control to show the order of a list of items
